attributes.action: lolly pop lady for hensington road just off green lane
attributes.additional_details: there is around 300 children that cross the busy main road on Hensington road Woodstock Oxfordshire so that we can walk to green lane from the primary school its so hard to cross people with pushchairs and one or two other children my sons are 1 and 3 iv had to abandon one child while i run across the road to get the other iv had cars speed up on us so wse cant cross iv had a man stop all traffic for me and others to cross its so dangerous we need a crossing of some sort! please help us!
